SendConfession(ulong, IUser, string, IMessageChannel, IInteractionContext, string?)

Sends a confession message to the confession channel.

Declaration
public Task SendConfession(ulong serverId, IUser user, string confession, IMessageChannel currentChannel, IInteractionContext ctx = null, string? imageUrl = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong serverId

The ID of the server where the confession is sent.
IUser user

The user who confessed.
string confession

The confession message.
IMessageChannel currentChannel

The current message channel.
IInteractionContext ctx

The interaction context, if available.
string imageUrl

The URL of the image, if any.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation.
